content.p: Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences Management Board On 27 September 2021 approved School of Education's application to name our annual education showcase after the late Professor Ganakumaran Subramaniam, the Head of School of Education from 2009 to 2021. This annual event will be called Ganakumaran Subramaniam Education Showcase from now on to commemorate the late Professor Ganakumaran Subramaniam's contributions to the School of Education at the University of Nottingham Malaysia. Ganakumaran Subramaniam Education Showcase is an event that celebrates students' achievements. The undergraduate and postgraduate students of the School of Education will exhibit their research, educational posters and teaching materials developed in the course of their studies. The participants of the annual event include members of staff and students of the University of Nottingham, as well as parents and invited members and students of other universities. telephone: +6 (03) 8725 3717 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
